name: Ambipom
flavorText:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

previous.name: Gastrodon
previous.flavorText:
It has a pliable body without any
bones. If any part of its body is
torn off, it grows right back.
previous.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined before a wild encounter based on whether the battle is in western or eastern Sinnoh and cannot be changed.

next.name: Drifloon
next.flavorText:
A Pokémon formed by the spirits
of people and Pokémon. It loves
damp, humid seasons.

pokemon.name: Aipom
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

pokemon.name: Ambipom
pokemon.flavorText:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.
